/usr/bin/cc CMakeFiles/opacity.dir/opacity.c.o CMakeFiles/opacity.dir/__/deps/glad_gl.c.o -o opacity  ../src/libglfw3.a -lm /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/librt.a -lm -ldl /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libwayland-client.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libwayland-cursor.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libwayland-egl.so
